html:
1. Click or touch to start example
  2. What is the absolute pressure at the surface of the water?
  3. What is the absolute pressure at the surface of the water?
    It depends on the environment. But unless otherwise stated its best to assume atmospheric pressure.
css: #{_an:id_prefix}an-anim > ol {list-style:none; position:relative; margin:0; padding:0;}#{_an:id_prefix}an-anim > ol > li {position:absolute; top:0; left:0; margin:0; padding:0; display:none;}#{_an:id_prefix}an-anim > ol > li.run {display:block; }#{_an:id_prefix}an-anim .{_an:id_prefix}an-stage { position: relative; overflow:hidden; margin:0; padding:0; }#{_an:id_prefix}an-anim .{_an:id_prefix}an-stage div { position: absolute; }.{_an:id_prefix}an-stage * {margin:0; padding:0; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;}#{_an:id_prefix}an-anim .{_an:id_prefix}an-stage img {position: absolute; top:0; left:0;}#{_an:id_prefix}an-anim .AN-Scene-Description {display: none;}#{_an:id_prefix}an-anim iframe {border: none; height:100%; width:100%}#{_an:id_prefix}an-anim .restart * { -webkit-animation-name: none !important; }#{_an:id_prefix}an-obj-2 { -webkit-transform: translate3d(135px, 149px, 0px);width: 209px;height: 21px;top:0;
